author: Special Correspondent
text:
Various models explaining the importance of nature and on protecting the environment, achievements of the country in the field of science and technology were displayed at the two-day exhibition on the topic ‘Nature 2016’ held at the Vetha Loga Vidhyalaya, Senthamangalam here recently.

The students from LKG to Standard VII displayed the models to highlight the importance of earth, water, fire, air, sky, surrounding environment, ill effects of damaging the environment. The students through other models explained the achievements of the county in the field of space science.

The students, taking into consideration the importance of merger of river, disaster management also displayed models and gave demonstration.

A large number of students and parents, along with government officials, environmental activists visited the exhibition on both the days and commended the initiative of students and teachers.
title: Students display models at ‘Nature 2016’
